languages.text: "Я не унижусь объяснениями перед мон-кай — и уж тем более перед червем вроде тебя. Быструю смерть? Я научу тебя, как нужно убивать по-настоящему — по капле крови, по мгновению неизбывной муки!"

"I will not stoop to explain myself to a mon-keigh — let alone a worm like you. A swift death? I will teach you the true art of killing — one drop of blood, one moment of insufferable agony at a time!"
languages.original_text: "Я не унижусь объяснениями перед мон-кай — и уж тем более перед червем вроде тебя. Быструю смерть? Я научу тебя, как нужно убивать по-настоящему — по капле крови, по мгновению неизбывной муки!"

traits.locale_text: "I will not stoop to explaining myself to a mon-keigh — let alone a worm like you. A swift death? I will teach you the true art of killing — one drop of blood, one moment of insufferable agony at a time!"

"I will not stoop to explaining myself to a mon-keigh — let alone a worm like you. A swift death? I will teach you the true art of killing — one drop of blood, one moment of insufferable agony at a time!"

"I will not stoop to explain myself to a mon-keigh — let alone a worm like you. A swift death? I will teach you the true art of killing — one drop of blood, one moment of insufferable agony at a time!"

"I will not stoop to explain myself to a mon-keigh — let alone a worm like you. A swift death? I will teach you the true art of killing — one drop of blood, one moment of insufferable agony at a time!"

"I will not stoop to explain myself to a mon-keigh — let alone a worm like you. A swift death? I will teach you the true art of killing — one drop of blood, one moment of insufferable agony at a time!"

languages.text: 「モン＝ケイどころか、貴様のような虫けらにご丁寧に説明するほど落ちぶれていない。秒殺だと？真の殺しの技術を教えてやる。一滴の血も一撃も逃さず、耐え難い苦痛ってものをその身をもって教えてやる！」
languages.original_text: "I will not stoop to explain myself to a mon-keigh — let alone a worm like you. A swift death? I will teach you the true art of killing — one drop of blood, one moment of insufferable agony at a time!"

traits.locale_text: 「モン＝ケイどころか、貴様のような虫けらにご丁寧に説明するほど落ちぶれていない。秒殺だと？真の殺しの技術を教えてやる。一滴の血も一撃も逃さず、耐え難い苦痛ってものをその身をもって教えてやる！」

languages.text: “我可不打算自降身份和猴子说话，何况你不过是只臭虫。死得痛快点？让我来告诉你什么是杀戮的艺术的！你洒下的每滴鲜血，都会为你带来无法忍受的痛苦！”
languages.original_text: "I will not stoop to explain myself to a mon-keigh — let alone a worm like you. A swift death? I will teach you the true art of killing — one drop of blood, one moment of insufferable agony at a time!"

traits.locale_text: “我可不打算自降身份和猴子说话，何况你不过是只臭虫。死得痛快点？让我来告诉你什么是杀戮的艺术的！你洒下的每滴鲜血，都会为你带来无法忍受的痛苦！”

languages.text: «No me rebajaré a explicarme a un mon-keigh. Y menos a un gusano como tú. ¿Una muerte rápida? Te enseñaré el verdadero arte de matar: gota a gota, ¡un momento agónico tras otro!».
languages.original_text: "I will not stoop to explain myself to a mon-keigh — let alone a worm like you. A swift death? I will teach you the true art of killing — one drop of blood, one moment of insufferable agony at a time!"

traits.locale_text: «No me rebajaré a explicarme a un mon-keigh. Y menos a un gusano como tú. ¿Una muerte rápida? Te enseñaré el verdadero arte de matar: gota a gota, ¡un momento agónico tras otro!».

languages.text: « Je ne m'abaisserai pas à me justifier auprès d'{mf|un|une} mon-keigh, et encore moins d'un rat pouilleux comme vous. Une mort rapide ? Je vais vous montrer comment on tue dans les règles de l'art : une goutte de sang, une souffrance atroce après l'autre ! »
languages.original_text: "I will not stoop to explain myself to a mon-keigh — let alone a worm like you. A swift death? I will teach you the true art of killing — one drop of blood, one moment of insufferable agony at a time!"

traits.locale_text: « Je ne m'abaisserai pas à me justifier auprès d'{mf|un|une} mon-keigh, et encore moins d’un rat pouilleux comme vous. Une mort rapide ? Je vais vous montrer comment on tue dans les règles de l'art : une goutte de sang, une souffrance atroce après l'autre ! »

languages.text: "Ich werde mich sicher nicht {mf|einem|einer} Chem-Pan-Sey erklären – und schon gar nicht einem Wurm wie Euch. Ein schneller Tod? Ich werde Euch die wahre Kunst des Tötens lehren – einen Blutstropfen und einen Augenblick unerträglicher Agonie nach dem anderen!"
languages.original_text: "I will not stoop to explain myself to a mon-keigh — let alone a worm like you. A swift death? I will teach you the true art of killing — one drop of blood, one moment of insufferable agony at a time!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde mich sicher nicht {mf|einem|einer} Chem-Pan-Sey erklären – und schon gar nicht einem Wurm wie Euch. Ein schneller Tod? Ich werde Euch die wahre Kunst des Tötens lehren – einen Blutstropfen und einen Augenblick unerträglicher Agonie nach dem anderen!"

languages.text: "Bir mon-keigh'e hesap verecek değilim. Hele ki senin gibisine. Çabuk bir ölüm mü? Ölüm neymiş sana göstereceğim. Bir damla kanda bin yıllık acıyı tattıracağım!"
languages.original_text: "I will not stoop to explain myself to a mon-keigh — let alone a worm like you. A swift death? I will teach you the true art of killing — one drop of blood, one moment of insufferable agony at a time!"

traits.locale_text: "Bir mon-keighe hesap verecek değilim. Hele ki senin gibisine. Çabuk bir ölüm mü? Ölüm neymiş göstereyim sana. Bir damla kanda bin yıllık acıyı tattırayım!"
